Package p4_group_8_repo.model.gameAttributes

Class ScoreHandler

java.lang.Object
p4_group_8_repo.model.gameAttributes.ScoreHandler
public class ScoreHandler
extends Object

Score Handler class

This class is responsible for extracting data from the permanent highscore list file and updating it.

Since:
2020
Version:
1.0
Author:
Sham Maatouk

  • Constructor Details

    • ScoreHandler

      public ScoreHandler()
      constructor for the score handler. makes sure that there is a score file. if not it creates one also stores the names and scores in array lists.

  • Method Details

    • isHigher

      public boolean isHigher​(int points, String name)
      This method is responsible for checking if the player's score is higher than any highscore in the list. if it is true then update() method is called to update the list of scores in the file.
      Parameters:
      points - the current score of the player
      name - the username of the player
      Returns:
      boolean if the player has a higher score or not

    • readHighest

      public int readHighest()
      This method is responsible for reading the highest score from a the list of highscores stored in a file.
      Returns:
      highScor int int value of highscore stored in a file

    • update

      public void update()
      This method is responsible for updating the highscore in the text file.

    • getHighscores

      public ArrayList<Integer> getHighscores()
      This method is responsible for getting the highscores from the highscore list file
      Returns:
      ArrayList list og highscores.

    • getNames

      public ArrayList<String> getNames()
      theis method is responsible for getting the names from the highscore list file.
      Returns:
      ArrayList names list.
